programme.title: Network News
programme.desc: Network News is a 30min news, news about china and the world.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep205206
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep47304731
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2104
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3697
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Lost Romance(M) Ep1819
programme.desc: Xiao-En Zheng is an ordinary editor for romance novels who always dreams that one day a rich hunk would come and save her. One of her enjoyable times is to peek out the window to see Tian-Xing He, who is a CEO working in the next building. Her world changes completely when an accident occurs. She time travels into her novel. Not knowing where she is, she sees Tian-Xing He walking towards her.

programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep5859
programme.desc: The name Kaohsiung has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from Da Gou. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiungs [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly. The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiungs century-old history.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep118
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1056
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep22
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep877878
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep694
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep470
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep2021
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit is the hottest underground boxer with unbeatable records. To save their boxing studio from being sold, he must win the fight against Shaolin who is known as "Killing Machine". Fok Kit is defeated and badly hurt in the fight, which is a set-up by Lok, who wants to take revenge on Fok Kits master, Debo.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: This crime comedy is about a bumbling young man Fang Nan, who kidnaps a middle-aged businessman Zhang Cheng Gong for ransom. However, the captor becomes the captive when Zhang turns the tables on Fang and forces him to complete three tasks. The two men soon find themselves sharing a journey filled with absurdity and deception.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the others mole.

programme.title: The Kiss Addict
programme.desc: One night after a performance, a young, talented violinist Wen Feng receives a kiss from a mysterious woman Duo La in Yalazhen. After that he begins his addiction to kissing. To find out the reason behind this mysterious new addiction, he goes back to Tibet in search of Duo La and ends up uncovering a mystery far beyond his comprehension

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: In the Mood for Love
programme.desc: This movie is Wong Kar Wais most acclaimed feature, navigating the subtle love relationship between Chow Mo Wan and Su Li Zhen after both discover their spouses having an affair with each other.

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: Treasure Hunt
programme.desc: A commercial director Peggy shoots an ad on a deserted island while some mysterious men with the treasure map are also there to hunt for the hidden Ming Dynasty treasures. However, the map is stolen by Star who lives on the island. Star and Peggy unveil the hidden treasures but end up being chased by the mysterious men

programme.title: The Macaque Monkey
programme.desc: The world is in chaos after the tree of life was burnt. Sun Wu Kong decides to return to the past to resurrect it, but his divine power is unstable after losing the golden hoop, and he must find his younger self to team up to find the power of time. As the six-eared Macaque Monkey also wants the power of time, they clash in a fierce battle

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Detrimental
programme.desc: You Ji Ren is a blind man who works at a factory in an outlying island. When the factory is cut off from the outside world by a hurricane one day, a monster appears and turns whoever sees it into black shadows. As You cannot see the monster, he is able to help other coworkers leave safely and fight to kill the monster!

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: Binding Souls
programme.desc: Five old friends revisit their school before it closes down to find records of paranormal existence, including the mysterious case of a missing student. The school was previously occupied by the Japanese for various human experiments and is known to be haunted. Can the five friends get out of the school safely?

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: A talented rogue trader experiences a 180-degree change in life when he encounters a girl who does not believe good things will happen to her. Will they fall in love? It seems like a Cinderellas adventure has just begun!

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say yes?

programme.title: I Fine… Thank You… Love You
programme.desc: Pleng, an English tutor, helps her student to pass a break up message in English to her boyfriend Gym. Gym knows nothing about English but wants to win back his girlfriend from the US, so he asks Pleng to teach him. Boorish and a slow learner, Gym makes many hilarious mistakes when learning English and ends up falling for Pleng.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome lifes challenges.

programme.title: Flashover
programme.desc: This is based on a true story. A sudden earthquake hits the gas pipes in an industrial park, triggering massive explosions and engulfing the neighboring area in flames. When the Fire Rescue Force reaches the scene, firefighters must fight against the flames and time, as they commit to safeguard lives with their own.

programme.title: Think Big Big
programme.desc: Moon is a plus-sized girl working happily as a mascot at a theme park. That is until one day she accidentally joins a weight loss competition, with her remarkable transformation turning her into the "Nations Goddess". Netizens have their eyes glued on her, turning her life upside down, and Moon has to find a way to be happy again.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung
programme.desc: The Ten Tigers of Kwang Tung is a group of anti-Ching martial artists who have killed a Ching official. Years later, when five disciples and descendants of Ten Tigers meet one night, one of them is killed by the son of the late Ching official who returns with a vengeance. They must fight against him to protect the Ten Tigers clan

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Vengeance Of A Snow Girl
programme.desc: A crippled woman seeks vengeance against the four men who killed her parents. However, when she crosses path with a young warrior who falls in love with her, trouble ensues as his father is one of the killers responsible for her family's massacre years ago.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: The Golden Buddha
programme.desc: A map indicating the location of the Chans family heirloom is hidden in three Golden Buddha statues. Paul, an insurance agent, finds one statue by chance and Chans daughter has another one. This makes them targets of treasure-hunting criminals and they have to team up to defeat them before unveiling the hidden secrets.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Changs. On the Changs farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaires Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: My Dream Boat
programme.desc: This is a story about the complicated love relationships between a group of young friends who are entangled in a web of love and emotions.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperors sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: When the Clouds Roll By
programme.desc: Su is a schizophrenic who refuses to believe that her pilot lover is killed in a plane crash and makes up stories to deal with things. She runs into an old classmate Lai, who is also a doctor one day, and he finds ways to treat her illness. Su slowly recovers and accepts the reality, as well as her newfound love.

programme.title: Oath Of Death
programme.desc: Three Sung loyalists become blood brothers to fight the tyranny of the Tartar invaders. To oust the oppressors altogether, Ma releases the kidnapped Tartar princess in a strategic effort to gain points with the invaders, but it soon becomes apparent that he desires both a great position and power, and will do anything to get it

programme.title: Dawn will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parents consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: This is adapted from Louis Chas The Book and the Sword. A young swordsman is tasked to lead a patriotic secret society to fight the traitorous general who colludes with the enemy. At the same time, he encounters a female warrior and two beautiful princesses, and is caught between all their affections for him.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: Finger of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous Finger of Doom, a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again

programme.title: Godfather of Canton
programme.desc: A docker, Lin Si Hai, accidentally saves Commissioner Cheng who then offers him a position in the police force. Lin is smart and soon rises through the ranks through treachery and corruption, before becoming a gangster.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servants confusion, threatening the couples union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Master Chen was an esteemed Monkey Kung Fu master, until he is framed and crippled by a ruthless villain and ends up becoming a wandering artiste. When Chen meets a young man, Little Monkey, on the streets, he decides to teach him all his monkey kung fu moves. Both men eventually team up to avenge Chens past insult.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: This joyous, raucous, & colorful tunefest showcases the little seen dancing talents of celebrated kung-fu swordswoman Cheng Pei-Pei, as one of 3 girls dancing their way to the top.

programme.title: Shaolin Prince
programme.desc: As the names of Chang Cheh and Liu Chia-liang became legendary, all-too-often the name of their equally valued collaborator, Tang Chia, is omitted. That may be, because, unlike the previous pair, the veteran kung-fu choreographer only went on to direct three movies of his own. Of course, that makes this trio all the more special, and this first effort perhaps the most special of all. It may be an eye-filling, mind-bending martial arts tale of two royal princes battling for the rightful recovery of the throne, but it's also a party, where Tang invites two cinematographers, three editors, and no less than five other choreographer friends to almost literally shoot the works. The results are kung-fu configurations not only never seen before, but never even imagined!

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Perils Of The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: The titanic team of Director Chu Yuan and Novelist Ku Lung chose to give their hero (Ti Lung) a whole new cliffhanger-fraught adventure featuring a mysterious swordsman, a sensual swordswoman, an imperial assassin, a ghost mansion, a booby-trapped tunnel, as well as double crosses and secret missions.

programme.title: The Empress Dowager
programme.desc: Award-winning drama featuring a passionate performance by Lisa Lu, enhanced by sumptuous costumes and sets, produces a powerful, fascinating story. In five thousand years of Chinese history, there was never a more fascinating woman than the dragon lady of the Ching Dynasty, also the Empress Dowager, who was the power behind the throne for the last half of the 19th century. The vast tapestry of palace intrigues is vividly brought to the screen.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: The Dream of the Red Chamber
programme.desc: Adapted from the great Chinese classic novel of the same name, the son of renowned Jia family, Bao Yu, is deeply in love with his cousin, Dai Yu. However, his mother disapproves of their relationship and plots to arrange Bao Yu to marry another rich girl, resulting in a tragic ending for the perfect couple.

programme.title: Roving Swordsman
programme.desc: An ambitious evil clan intends to rule the martial arts world. To achieve their goal, they must first steal a secret martial arts manuscript depicting how firearms can be produced. However, a supremely intelligent swordsman Shen Sheng Yi is protecting the manuscript and remains one step ahead of the evil clan.

programme.desc: Tamil Romantic Comedy Film, Starring, Sundeep Kishan, Neha Shetty, Bobby Simha & Others

programme.title: Vanamagan
programme.desc: An Andaman tribal who escapes from men trying to capture his people, ends up in the care of a spoilt, rich girl, who starts to fall in love with him. The Film features Jayam Ravi & Sayeesha in the lead roles

programme.title: Elvis
programme.desc: From Oscar-nominated visionary filmmaker Baz Luhrmann comes Warner Bros. Pictures' drama Elvis, starring Austin Butler and Oscar winner Tom Hanks.The film explores the life and music of Elvis Presley (Butler), seen through the prism of his complicated relationship with his enigmatic manager, Colonel Tom Parker (Hanks). The story delves into the complex dynamic between Presley and Parker spanning over 20 years, from Presley's rise to fame to his unprecedented stardom, against the backdrop of the evolving cultural landscape and loss of innocence in America. Central to that journey is one of the most significant and influential people in Elvis's life, Priscilla Presley (Olivia DeJonge).'

programme.title: Syriana
programme.desc: Syriana: noun a geographical term referring to those Middle East hot spots that have proven volatile with regard to the security of the United States; a place in the Middle East where trouble is always breaking out. Based on the best-selling book See No Evil: The True Story of a Ground Soldier in the CIA's War on Terrorism by Robert Baer, this timely political thriller takes a penetrating look at the efforts of the U.S. intelligence-gathering community in the Middle East, weaving together several storylines ranging from American foreign policy and the CIA's role in it to the oil industry and terrorism. Welcome to Syriana.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: Based on the first volume in Philip Pullman's best-selling, award-winning trilogy, His Dark Materials, THE GOLDEN COMPASS unfolds an epic fantasy adventure set in a parallel world, where science and magic intertwine.Twelve-year-old Lyra Belacqua (played by newcomer Dakota Blue Richards) sets out to rescue her best friend, and ends up on an extraordinary quest to save not only her own world, but ours and others as well. Academy Award winner Nicole Kidman and stars with Daniel Craig in this triumph of the imagination. Filled with fascination, depth and wonder, Pullman's saga presents the eternal struggle of good vs. evil -- and the power of one young girl heal a rift torn in the fabric of the universe.

programme.title: A Nightmare On Elm Street
programme.desc: Don't fall asleep! Freddy Krueger returns to everyone's nightmares in this contemporary re-imagining of the Wes Craven horror classic. Watchmen's Jackie Earle Haley plays the razor-fingered iconic killer who haunts the dreams of teenagers and kills them in their sleep. As long as they stay awake, they can protect one another ... but once they fall asleep, there is no escape.

programme.desc: As Iris receives word of a career milestone, Barry is suddenly nowhere to be found. Khione continues to figure out her powers and Chester works on a suit for Allegra.

programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q pose as unreceptive receptionists in an office waiting room, then head to a wax museum where they mingle with the stiff crowd. And in the double punishment, the two losers are taken on a chopper ride from hell.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 04
programme.desc: A string of neighborhood burglaries hits close to home for Murtaugh, and it gets personal for Riggs when another break-in ends in a casualty.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 05
programme.desc: While Murtaugh delves deep into the psyche of a Navy SEAL wanted for criminal activity, Riggs' connection to the suspect threatens to interfere with the case, and open up to Murtaugh.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 06
programme.desc: When Riggs & Murtaugh investigate the high-profile murder of a young model, they uncover a secret behind one of L.A.'s wealthiest families - that may have ties to Miranda Riggs.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 07
programme.desc: As Riggs & Murtaugh examine the murder of one of L.A.'s fashion expeditors, they follow a trail of evidence that leads them to a dangerous underground investigation by the D.E.A.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S1 08
programme.desc: When a casino heist takes a deadly turn, Riggs looks after the only credible witness, an eight year-old boy.Meanwhile, Murtaugh pulls some dangerous stunts on a motorcycle.

programme.title: The Flash S7 6
programme.desc: While Iris forges a connection with the speed force, Cisco and Chester travel back in time and get stuck in 1998, repeating the same day over and over again.

programme.title: The Flash S7 7
programme.desc: When a mysterious ice powered enemy frames Frost for a brutal crime, she must find a way to clear her name. Also, Barry and Iris have a surprise houseguest.

programme.title: The Flash S7 8
programme.desc: With Frost facing an unjust punishment for her past crimes, Caitlin goes to great lengths to save her sister. Meanwhile, Barry's efforts to protect Speed Force Nora lead to a shocking discovery.

programme.title: The Flash S7 9
programme.desc: After a devastating betrayal, Barry turns to Timeless Wells for help. Meanwhile, Iris leads Team Citizen down a dangerous road in search of answers, and Cisco confides his biggest fear to Kamilla.

programme.title: The Flash S7 10
programme.desc: Iris is pushed to the limit as she seeks to uncover the mysterious truth about Psych. Meanwhile, Barry initiates a new training system that could potentially backfire, with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 10
programme.desc: The guys head to the park asking strangers to agree with their bizarre points of view, then give classless lessons about real estate. Plus, tonight's loser finds himself in a harrowing race to the finish at the racetrack.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 11
programme.desc: The guys get a taste of babysitting while asking reluctant strangers to watch their kid, then head to the grocery store to conduct taste(less) tests with shoppers, and tonight's loser is forced to strip for the wrong people.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 12
programme.desc: The guys get extra cheesy at a pizza parlor, then head to Wall Street where they ask strangers to help translate bizarre text messages in Spanish. And trapped in a haunted house, a nightmare comes to life for tonight's big loser.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S8 13
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Sal and Murr take in more than they bargained for while working at a tailor shop, then convince strangers to hand over their cell phones. And tonight's big loser sacrifices his childhood for a punishment three months in the making.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S5 1
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr and Q pose as unreceptive receptionists in an office waiting room, then head to a wax museum where they mingle with the stiff crowd. And in the double punishment, the two losers are taken on a chopper ride from hell.

programme.title: Grudge Match
programme.desc: Oscar winner Robert De Niro (Raging Bull, Silver Linings Playbook) and Oscar nominee Sylvester Stallone (the Rocky films, The Expendables) play Billy The Kid McDonnen and Henry Razor Sharp, two local Pittsburgh fighters whose fierce rivalry put them in the national spotlight. Each had scored a victory against the other during their heyday, but in 1983, on the eve of their decisive third match, Razor suddenly announced his retirement, refusing to explain why but effectively delivering a knock-out punch to both their careers. Thirty years later, boxing promoter Dante Slate Jr., seeing big dollar signs, makes them an offer they cant refuse: to re-enter the ring and settle the score once and for all.

programme.title: Friends S9 12
programme.desc: Rachel is irritated to learn that her handsome new workplace rival, Gavin, has been invited to her birthday party.

programme.title: Friends S9 13
programme.desc: While Rachel sorts out her conflicted feelings for her handsome co-worker Gavin, Ross recruits Chandler to help him meet attractive women in order to make Rachel jealous.

programme.title: Friends S9 14
programme.desc: Joey and Phoebe conspire to arrange awful dates for both Rachel and Ross, hoping that appreciation of their former relationship will cause them to reunite.

programme.title: Friends S9 15
programme.desc: Joey develops an unusual acting method in order to impress a famous, pompous fellow actor, Leonard, during an audition for an important stage role.

programme.title: Friends S9 16
programme.desc: Phoebe asks her boyfriend, Mike to move in with her. Also, Rachel's efforts to make the apartment safe for her baby make Joey crazy.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 02
programme.desc: Michael astounds dental patients with molar radio transmissions, and while appraising art, he brings an extinct species back to life. Plus, an unusual brew stirs a ghostly hallucination that will make jaws drop.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 03
programme.desc: Michael stretches headphone cords and reality with a mystical putty, stuns a coworker with new bathroom technology, and in the big finale, a Porta Potty becomes a Portal Potty, leaving a construction worker amazed.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 04
programme.desc: Working at a tattoo parlor, Michael gets some killer ink in a flash. Then it's SNAKES ON A SEDAN when a serpent ambushes a routine car checkup, and down on the docks, one unlucky guy learns a lesson in shrinkage.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 5
programme.desc: Michael unearths a mutant turtle from a mystical Peruvian clay; a woman is blown away when 2 adorable bunnies become 8, and to top it off, a hapless carpenter becomes an accidental time traveler when a potent new glue has him coming undone.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 06
programme.desc: A miraculous liquid gives Michael the Midas touch in an eyeglass store. And later, Michael trains the new girl at a tanning salon, but things take a horrifying turn when she believes she's killed her first customer.

programme.title: The Flash S9 10
programme.desc: As Iris receives word of a career milestone, Barry is suddenly nowhere to be found. Khione continues to figure out her powers and Chester works on a suit for Allegra.

programme.title: The Hangover Part Ii
programme.desc: Ready for another round? In the follow-up to the record-breaking hit comedy, Phil (Bradley Cooper), Stu (Ed Helms), Alan (Zach Galifianakis) and Doug (Justin Bartha) travel to exotic Thailand for Stu's wedding. After Doug's now-unforgettable Las Vegas bachelor party, Stu is not taking any chances and has opted for a safe and subdued pre-wedding brunch. Things don't always go as planned however. What happens in Vegas may stay in Vegas, but what happens in Bangkok can't even be imagined think monkeys, tattoos and the return of Mr. Chow! Acclaimed comedy filmmaker Todd Phillips reunites with his comic quartet of over-indulged stars for another globe-trotting howl at the moon with the "Wolfpack."

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: R is a young introspective zombie. During a human scavenger party, R meets Julie and feels an urge to protect her, which sparks a strangely warm relationship that allows R to begin regaining his humanity. Caught between the paranoid humans and the ferocious "Bonies", R and Julie must find a way to bridge the differences of each side to fight for a better world no one thought possible.

programme.desc: I Cried, Cried My Lungs Out, And Stopped Crying/The Meaning Of Courage - Subaru begins his first day for the fifth time in RoswaalIsnt mansion and attempts to find the culprit behind his curse.

programme.title: Re: Zero -Starting Life In Another World- Director’s Cut Ep6
programme.desc: Fanatical Methods Like A Demon/Rem - Beatrice is unable to remove SubaruIsnt curses. Rem runs away with Subaru and Ram after dreaming of her past with Ram.

programme.title: Best Of Animax Ep1
programme.desc: Best Of Animax - Enjoy a variety of curated content specially from Animax.

programme.title: Fena: Pirate Princess Ep3
programme.desc: Bar-Baral - Inheriting her fatherIsnt journey, Fena embarks from Goblin Island with Yukimaru and others to the free town, Bar-Baral.

programme.title: Fena: Pirate Princess Ep4
programme.desc: The Mystery Of The Stone - After escaping from their pursuers, Fena heads to Libar-Oberstein, where stones are made and decide to train herself.

programme.title: Spooky Kitaro 6 Ep8
programme.desc: Menace! Kagami JijIIIsnt Plot - Mana and friends accidentally offend a yokai, but Kagami Jijii saves her just in time by pulling her into a mirror.

programme.title: Spooky Kitaro 6 Ep9
programme.desc: The KappaIsnt Work Reform - Kappa hired to work at an IT firm rebel after finding out that they are shortchanged with cucumbers as their pay.

programme.title: Spooky Kitaro 6 Ep10
programme.desc: Vanishing! The Seven School Mysteries - Mana is bothered by a mysterious yokai in school, but is unable to find out who it is despite Neko MusumeIsnt help.

programme.title: Spooky Kitaro 6 Ep11
programme.desc: Conquer Japan! The 808 Tanuki Army - Japan is under lockdown after being invaded by tanuki, and Mana is kidnapped while trying to send a letter to Kitaro.

programme.title: Yashahime: Princess Half-Demon - The Second Act - Ep3
programme.desc: The Silver-Scale Curse - Jaken recalls the details of Zero casting the silver-scale curse on Rin 14 years ago. Riku appears and rescues Setsuna.

programme.title: Yashahime: Princess Half-Demon - The Second Act - Ep4
programme.desc: The Barrier At Mount Musubi - Towa and others are trapped in a barrier set up by an evil magical power on Mount Musubi where there is Kyuyokon Root.

programme.title: Yashahime: Princess Half-Demon - The Second Act - Ep5
programme.desc: The Girl Named Rion - Rion asks Setsuna to cut the bad ties she has with her father. Towa is given a weapon which can kill Kyuyokon.

programme.title: Yashahime: Princess Half-Demon - The Second Act - Ep6
programme.desc: Hisui The Demon Slayer - Setsuna is abducted. After she wakes, Princess Aiya asks her to be her substitute. Setsuna says yes reluctantly.

programme.title: Sk8 The Infinity Ep11

programme.title: Sk8 The Infinity Ep12
programme.desc: Our Infinity! - Adam and Langa race at the SIsnt original and dangerous track, and a fall helps Langa remember the fun in skating.

programme.title: Sleepy Princess In The Demon Castle Ep1
programme.desc: Sleepless Princess Of The Castle - Princess Syalis is held captive in the demon castle, where she gathers various materials to try to sleep well.

programme.desc: A fresh batch of Masked Singers battle it out - Jacket Potato vs Fawn, Rubbish vs Pigeon, and Piece of Cake vs Rhino. The second celebrity's true identity is revealed at the end of the show.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S11 Ep18
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S11 Ep15
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep11
programme.desc: If I Should Die Before I Wake - A nun hires Magnum and Higgins to investigate a mysterious and large cash donation made to a parishioner undergoing medical treatment at the church.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep12
programme.desc: Angels Sometimes Kill - Shammy (Christopher Thornton) asks Magnum and Higgins to locate his missing friend, a homeless veteran.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep13
programme.desc: Judge Me Not - When Hawaii Supreme Court nominee Judge Rachel Park (Moon Bloodgood) is being blackmailed, she hires Magnum and Higgins who go to extraordinary lengths to help her out.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep14
programme.desc: Run, Baby, Run - A bail bondsman hires Magnum and Higgins to track down a woman who skipped out on her $250,000 bond.

programme.title: Magnum PI ('18) S4 Ep15
programme.desc: Dead Man Walking - When Magnum balks at notorious crime boss Osi Shimas (Eijiro Ozaki) request to find his missing son, Magnum learns hes been poisoned.

programme.title: Pulse Ep1
programme.desc: Crunch - A troubled video game designer and her team find themselves in bizarre circumstances which mirror the video game they have created. Trapped in a toxic building, she must help her colleagues escape. Its no longer a game.

programme.title: Pulse Ep2
programme.desc: Down The Rabbit Hole - Jaz, Errol, Dom and Caspar begin to test the shifting boundaries of their own and others psychosis. Around them, the building assumes a malevolent life of its own.

programme.title: Pulse Ep3
programme.desc: Wonderland - Eddie and Denny engineer another classic game-play staple: A race-against time for a life hanging in the balance. Jaz determines they will pass that test, win that race, save that life. An unlikely source thinks otherwise.

programme.title: Pulse Ep4
programme.desc: Through The Looking Glass - Eddie snatches the most vulnerable player from their grasp. All but Jaz thinks hes dead. Its worse. A re-introduction to the monster in his past. Our heroes frantic search for him leads to other levels.

programme.title: Pulse Ep5
programme.desc: Kindred Spirits - Jaz finally manages to utilise her evolving skills of perception to locate their missing player. Our team descends to the lowest levels of the building only to find their deadliest threat yet.

programme.title: Pulse Ep6
programme.desc: Smoke & Mirrors - As they run, Jaz slips into her own sense of hell which is mirrored in the vile contents of the building. With the exit finally in front of them, it seems the tutorial may be complete, but the game is far from over.

A man writing a book about the paranormal travels to New York and stays in a hotel room that has been said to be responsible for the death of all the guests that come to stay.

programme.title: The Ninth Gate

programme.title: Secrets Of A Gold Digger Killer
programme.desc: When Celeste Beards multimillionaire husband was killed by her delusional and disturbed friend Tracey, Celeste was certain she would never be blamed. But Celestes twin daughters discovered the truth and works to bring her to justice.

programme.title: The Wrong Daughter
programme.desc: Kate and Joe are considering in-vitro options when a child Kate gave up 17 years ago resurfaces. Danica moves in with Kate and as time passes, cracks begin to appear, is she really Kate's daughter?

programme.desc: In this box office smash, Indiana Jones must rescue some missing children kidnapped by religious terrorists in the Orient who happen to possess some stolen, sacred jewels.

programme.title: Indiana Jones And The Last Crusade

programme.title: The Last Of The Mohicans

programme.desc: Don Cheadle - Movie star Don Cheadle joins Bear on a 48-hour trek through the unrelenting White Mountains of New England. It's rugged, remote and full of dangerous rivers.

programme.desc: Wildlife adventurer Gordon Buchanan uses a dog team to retrace the steps of famous arctic explorers and examine the ancient relationship between man and dog.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Kaipara Harbour - Kaipara Harbour is thought to have claimed up to 150 shipwrecks since the 1840s. Neil Oliver hits Ripiro Beach in a blokart, and is treated to a sound and light show at Gibbs Farm.

programme.desc: Devastating floods trap residents in Australia, a base jumper gets stranded in freezing temperatures and a destructive hail storm batters Texas.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep2
programme.desc: Socks - Gregg Wallace gets to grips with socks at a factory in Leicester.

programme.desc: Wildlife adventurer Gordon Buchanan uses a dog team to retrace the steps of famous arctic explorers and examine the ancient relationship between man and dog.

programme.title: Michael Palin - Into Iraq S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Michael continues his journey into the heart of Iraq on his way to Baghdad, and arrives in Kirkuk and the exact spot where the British discovered oil in 1927, when they also ruled the country. The next day, Michael heads towards Tikrit, Saddam Hussein's hometown. Having been stopped at several military checkpoints along the way, but is surprised when he receives a warm welcome from the local commander and coins it 'Checkpoint Cheerful'.

programme.title: Planet Earth II S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mountains - Great mountain ranges may provide some spectacular landscapes, but they are difficult habitats to live in. This film offers an intimate look at the secretive lives of mountain animals.

programme.title: Planet Earth II S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jungles - Jungles offer mysterious worlds with surprising animal characters - follow some of them in the forests of Madagascar as they struggle to survive in this competitive habitat.

programme.title: Planet Earth II S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Deserts - The world's deserts are lands of extremes that force animals to adapt in clever ways to cope with the hostile conditions, producing some incredible survival stories.

programme.title: Planet Earth II S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Grasslands - Grasslands cover a quarter of all land and support vast gatherings of wildlife - but to survive here animals must endure the most hostile seasonal changes on Earth.

programme.title: Planet Earth II S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Cities - Cities are the fastest growing habitat on Earth, but life in the man-made world is not easy for animals. Will the future see cities designed for wildlife too?

programme.desc: With a thrilling third series of the Bafta-winning adventure now over, our five pairs meet up again to reflect on the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: Planet Earth III S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Coasts - David Attenborough presents the first in a new series. Coasts: where two worlds collide, and where animals fight for survival amidst constant change.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep3
programme.desc: An old and deserted dry dock is transformed into an amazing subterranean museum, after the engineers drain the entire ground and build a new concrete base.

programme.title: Coast New Zealand S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Kaipara Harbour - Kaipara Harbour is thought to have claimed up to 150 shipwrecks since the 1840s. Neil Oliver hits Ripiro Beach in a blokart, and is treated to a sound and light show at Gibbs Farm.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep2
programme.desc: An Island Home - Face a tough decision when Estis leg infection puts the brakes on this young duikers release. Then track and collar a young lion with Dr. Amanda; check on an ailing bush baby; and greet the noisy new addition to the center, a grumpy grey parrot.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 Ep3
programme.desc: One Very Lost Sea Turtle - Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Duckling Dramas - Deal with duelling duckling roundups and find out if vet Karina calls in specialists to treat koala Spikes leg fracture. Get to the bottom of stomach issues plaguing baby echidnas Ping and Pong, and meet koala Jarrah, who seems to have lost his way.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Into the Sunset - Contend with a flood of abandoned koala joeys, then join vet nurse Nick on a hunt for natural remedies to treat a wallabys gut ailment. Ponder options for a baby bat stuck in a tree and look on as vet Karina operates on a barn owls fractured wing.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Australia - Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse. The beach turns into a dueling ground, and the outback becomes a boxing ring, as animals face off with their own kind.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Body Language - Join researchers as they study how animals communicate. Find out how wolves use their body language to unite the pack and maintain a sophisticated social structure, and see the astounding number of gestures chimps use to communicate.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep1
programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlottes tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Savanna - The African savanna is an epic landscape, and whether its head-bashing hippos, hormone-crazed elephants or dueling lions, battles that rage on the savanna are just as epic.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 Ep1
programme.desc: How to Catch a Lizard - Tag along as Dr. Amanda rescues a blind pet baboon, and watch Dr. Charlottes tricky surgery on a pangolin whose leg must be amputated after a run-in with poachers. Later, chase a rhino, two young baboons gone AWOL, and a fiesty monitor lizard.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Into the Sunset - Contend with a flood of abandoned koala joeys, then join vet nurse Nick on a hunt for natural remedies to treat a wallabys gut ailment. Ponder options for a baby bat stuck in a tree and look on as vet Karina operates on a barn owls fractured wing.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep4
programme.desc: India - Welcome to India a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare. Monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Coast - Massive elephant seals go nose to nose to win the title of beachmaster, and giant petrels earn the nickname, murderous garbagemen. Meanwhile, a female humpback goes to extremes to protect her calf from amorous males.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Island Feast - Off the coast of Oman, summer weather drives nutrients in from the ocean depths where they meet the Arabian sun, causing an explosion of life. Smaller fish spawn, filling the waters with eggs. This creates a buffet predators just cant resist.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Cocos Island - Dubbed "the most beautiful island in the world" by Jacques Cousteau, Cocos Island is a gem among Costa Ricas national parks. Aboard the Undersea Hunter, well explore the areas hammerhead and Galapagos sharks, rays, and other large marine species that populate these deep waters.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Socorro Islands - A wild and remote chain 400 kilometres south of Cabo San Lucas in the eastern Pacific, the Socorro Islands have been called the Mexican Galapagos. They're known for jaw-dropping encounters with giant Pacific manta rays, hammerhead schools, dolphins, and tiger sharks.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Bahamas - The islands of the Bahamas are ringed with lush coral, underground cave systems, and plunging barrier reefs. Beyond the white sands and turquoise water, marine life abounds: agile reef sharks, large whitetip sharks, manatees, sea turtles, and wild dolphins.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Lost Boy - Film a wild dog hunt with Julz as he catches up with the Manzi pack at a kill, and watch for leopards and hyenas as the Kakuli pack takes great risks while waiting for the rains to come. Go on an epic hunt with a returning male of the Stork Colony.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Here Comes the Rain - Welcome the rains as an emotional Julz says farewell to the dog packs. He discovers the Stork Colony pups hunting guinea fowl, and is heartened to find the Kakuli pups feeding on an antelope carcass. The playful Manzi pack corner a tough warthog.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Back with the Packs - Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi and the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs. See yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups and leaves her frantically searching for them.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hunting with the Manzi - Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Missing Manzi - Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack, who they filmed last year, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. Spot the Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion ensues.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Kakumbi Are Vulnerable - Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Tragedy Strikes Kakumbi - Feel your heart race when the Kakumbi tree a leopard whos been stalking them. Join Julz on a ZCP lion-collaring mission, go fishing with scout Simon, explore mealtime pack hierarchy, and witness a heartbreaking vigil for a badly injured Kakumbi pup.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Manzi the Superpack - Head back to the den with the Kakumbi, who are mourning the loss of two pups. Chance upon a hyena den and a lion pride trying to take down a buffalo, then catch up with the Manzi, who are in a standoff with a leopard and a herd of angry elephants.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hollywoods Held Hostage - During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep4
programme.desc: India - Welcome to India a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare. Monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons 1 Ep2

programme.desc: Springbok & Impala: Life in the Herd - From the dry deserts of the west to the moist savannas of the east, these two species are pivotal in the success of both plants and animals living across this divide.

programme.desc: Back with the Packs - Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi and the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs. See yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups and leaves her frantically searching for them.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hunting with the Manzi - Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Missing Manzi - Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack, who they filmed last year, and a Manzi faction whove ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group. Spot the Kakumbi making a kill before a happy Manzi reunion ensues.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Kakumbi Are Vulnerable - Encounter an elephant as Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups, who face off with a stubborn, razor-tusked warthog. Follow Thandie Mweetwa, ZCPs lion specialist, who counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Tragedy Strikes Kakumbi - Feel your heart race when the Kakumbi tree a leopard whos been stalking them. Join Julz on a ZCP lion-collaring mission, go fishing with scout Simon, explore mealtime pack hierarchy, and witness a heartbreaking vigil for a badly injured Kakumbi pup.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Manzi the Superpack - Head back to the den with the Kakumbi, who are mourning the loss of two pups. Chance upon a hyena den and a lion pride trying to take down a buffalo, then catch up with the Manzi, who are in a standoff with a leopard and a herd of angry elephants.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hollywoods Held Hostage - During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Canada - Canada, where summer is short and time is tight any time is the right time to fight. The mighty North provides the setting for bison, bald eagles, and polar bears to wage some of the most heavy-duty fighting in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep7
programme.desc: South America - From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.

programme.title: Arabian Seas 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Defenders of the Reef - Its summer in the Gulf of Oman. The scorching Arabian sun heats the shallow waters to 86 degrees boosting the growth of algae across a vast coral reef. This attracts thousands of hungry herbivores creating a fish versus fish turf war.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Belize - More than 200 caves play host to an unmatched array of marine life and coral formations in this underwater kingdom 40 kilometres from Belize City. It's a deep blue wilderness brimming with rare, exotic fish, eagle rays, sharks, and huge green morays.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cozumel - Clear waters, deep reefs, dangerous caves, and tunnels draw divers to the island of Cozumel on Mexicos east coast. The Caribbean Sea port is home to multicoloured schools of fish, bull sharks, and gigantic sea turtles.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Roatan - Home to Earths second-largest barrier reef, Roatn is one of the worlds top dive spotsknown for its rare black coral, low-lying nurse sharks, and fearsome-looking barracuda.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: After the Wildfires - Examine fires pivotal role in shaping Australias natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continents wildlife.

programme.title: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades
programme.desc: The Accidental Wilderness: Europe's Everglades - Marvel at the stunning conversion of a bleak waste-water dumping ground into a paradise for Europes birds. Travel to western Germany for an intimate look at this reclamation success story, and see the thriving animal communities that live there.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summers soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Osprey: Sea Raptor - Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys whove been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story
programme.desc: Woodpeckers: The Hole Story - March to the steady drumbeat of a unique avian family. Learn why the worlds 239 woodpecker species, from massive to minute, are natures best lumberjacks; explore their flying, climbing, and calling skills; and get a look inside their secret nests.

programme.title: Weird, Wild & Wonderful
programme.desc: Weird, Wild & Wonderful - Trek across Africa for a peek at the colorful, quirky survival strategies of its animals. See these furry, feathered, and scaled magicians, from flamboyant flamingos to vanishing lizards, find food, elude predators, and find mates against all odds.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep20
programme.desc: Baritone Tea Part 1 / Baritone Tea Part 2 - Uh, oh Archibald accidentally drinks all of Finly's vocal-enhancing tea on the eve of his brother's big concert!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep20
programme.desc: The Man In The Iron Booty - King Julien sends his entire kingdom away on rafts to help an alleged fellow king who is supposedly in distress.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep39
programme.desc: Lucky and the Wayward Wedding - Jim and Kate are getting married... or are they?

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep33
programme.desc: Skull & Bows / Nine to Harv - A suspicious Audrey investigates the Bow. Richie helps Lotta launch her dream business: selling custom stuffed animals in San Francisco.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep33
programme.desc: Crow Pox/Faking Ammends - A prank leads to "crow pox" for the FAST snails, who make a treacherous climb to find a cure; Burn and her hippie sister try to end their rivalry.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep20
programme.desc: It Takes a Zenko / What a Racket - When various townsfolk report having lost soft belongings, TZG secretly investigates to discover thieving pigeon Yolanda had been building a nest for baby gophers. / When Ians lucky badminton racket goes missing, TZG secretly finds and returns it in time for a rematch against his toughest opponent.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Ep20
programme.desc: Baritone Tea Part 1 / Baritone Tea Part 2 - Uh, oh Archibald accidentally drinks all of Finly's vocal-enhancing tea on the eve of his brother's big concert!

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep26
programme.desc: Musical Thrones / Branch Burn - Poppy hosts the biggest contest of the year for the chance to with a cool new hug watch/The Snack Pack go on a Caterbus road-trip and get sucked into a wormhole

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep26
programme.desc: Gherkin Returns / This Blows - The 5th Mighty One, Gherkin, visits for the weekend but Berrys perplexed to discover that hes changed. / The Mighty Ones get stuck in a vortex created by a leaf blower war between neighbors.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep39
programme.desc: Skeleton Town - The townspeople are so terrified when Puss brings the skeleton army back to San Lorenzo that they ignore Uli's sad attempts at being evil and scary.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep14
programme.desc: As the Diaper Changes - When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep15
programme.desc: Super Cool Big Kids Inc. - Convinced old people are the new enemy, Boss Baby uses Tim to create havoc at the senior center, but a war soon begins when the seniors rally against babies

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep51
programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 1 - Hiccup doesn't know who to trust when Viggo and Ryker each tell him that the other has gone rogue, and is sidetracked when a new dragon attacks.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep52
programme.desc: Shell Shocked Part 2 - An extremely powerful new dragon attacks Dragon's Edge, and Hiccup makes a dangerous alliance while the fate of the Dragon Eye hangs in the balance.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep2
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Dreadful Debacle of DJ Drowsy Drawers - George and Harold attempt to save the fun at their school dance, but matters are made worse when their music teachers transforms into the dull yet deadly villain DJ Drowsy Drawers

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep3
programme.desc: Blade of the Red Phoenix - Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep4
programme.desc: The Intruder Flies a Crooked Path - When Jindiao arrives to the Village, he invites the kids to participate in an exhibition match, but has alternative motives
